CheckTitle: Ensure ATP Policy for SharePoint, OneDrive, and Teams is correctly configured.
Description: Checks if ATP Policy for O365 is configured with EnableATPForSPOTeamsODB and EnableSafeDocs enabled, and AllowSafeDocsOpen disabled.
Risk: If ATP Policy for SharePoint, OneDrive, and Teams is not correctly configured, users may be exposed to malicious files and unsafe document handling.

Code.Other: 1. Go to Microsoft 365 Defender (https://security.microsoft.com). 2. Expand Email & collaboration > Policies & rules > Threat policies. 3. Under Policies, select Safe Attachments. 4. Edit the ATP Policy for O365 and ensure the correct settings for SharePoint, OneDrive, and Teams.

Recommendation.Text: Enable ATP for SharePoint, OneDrive, and Teams, enable SafeDocs, and disable AllowSafeDocsOpen in the ATP Policy for O365.

Notes: This check validates that ATP Policy for SharePoint, OneDrive, and Teams is correctly configured.
